Re Western Area Power Administration Cc FYI Per verification recd below and pending letterhead documentation from the counterparty CP Western Area Power Administration Desert SW Region will be inactivated in GCP CP will involve a name change procedure from Western Area Power Administration Phoenix Area Office to Western Area Power Administration Desert Southwest Region BR Forwarded by Bernice RodriguezHOUECT on PM Rhonda L Denton AM To Bernice CT cc Subject Re Western Area Power Administration Bernice here is the information on WAPA counterparties I will send you a specific request on each of these entities when I can get to it In the meantime can you please change the name for WAPA phonenix to WAPADesert Southwest Region so that we do not have duplicate records and tell EOL about the changes Let me know if you have questions EOL is waiting for me to populate a contract for the new record that you set up for desert SW region and we need to get this resolved Forwarded by Rhonda L DentonHOUECT on AM Mark Meyer on AM To cc Subject Re Western Area Power Administration These offices are members WAPAColorado River Storage Project Manangement Center CRSP This office is in Salt Lake City and was formerly known as Salt Lake City Area or Upper Colorado WAPADesert Southwest Region This office is in Phoenix and was formerly know as Phoenix Area or Lower Colorado WAPARocky Mountain Region This office is in Loveland Colorado and was formerly known as Loveland Area LovelandFort Collins Area and Lower Missouri WAPAUpper Great Plains Region This office is in Billings MT and was formerly known as Billings Area Upper Missouri and PickSloan Missouri You can find information about all these offices at our website wwwwapagov Thanks Mark Meyer PM I work for Enron and am trying to determine which of your offices are members of the Western Systems Power Pool and what the current names are for your entitites I need the full legal name for each Below is a list of the names I have in my database of names Can you please confirm if these are current andor if any names have been changed The WSPP Administrator sent me the attachment which indicates the Phoenix office houses Lower Colorado Im not sure if this is accurate Thank you very much for your help WAPASalt Lake City WAPADesert Southwest Region WAPALower Missouri WAPAPickSloan Missouri WAPARocky Mountain WAPASierra Nevada Region WAPAUpper Great Plain WAPABillings Area WAPAPhoenix Area Rhonda Denton Contracts Administration FAX Forwarded by Rhonda L DentonHOUECT on PM Rachel Small on PM To cc Subject Re Western Area Power Administration Hello Rhonda I am attaching a Word document with all the WSPP member contacts for Western Area Power Administrations hopefully one of them is the one you are looking for if not please let me know and I will try to find out Rachel Strauss Small Web Development Team fax Original Message From To Sent Tuesday April PM Subject Western Area Power Administration Can you please tell me if WAPA Desert Southwest Region is a member of the WSPP This is their Phoenix office and I thought they had been a member of the WSPP under the name Western Area Power AdministrationPhoenix Area Office Thanks for the info See attached file Western Adm Contactsdoc

Ferrellgas Cc Everyone The following new record has been created in GCP Both Ferrellgas LP CP and Ferrell North America CP will remain active record Several Enron entities have links to these records as well Bernice x

Confirmation on Master Dates Cc Can you please confirm for me what the financial master agreement dates are for Utilicorp United Inc GCP shows and Dynegy Canada Inc GCP shows Canada currently has several confirmations that are being held until we can resolve what the dates are Bernice

Re Confirmation on Master Datesdo not have access to the dbaseis it an option when submitting a SRRS request GCP await the hard copy of the executedunder negotiation report to confirm master dates We also rely on the daily emails from Susan that indicate when a new master has been signed However in these two cases Peggy H in Canada is thinking the dates are different from what was originally setup Bernice From Tana Jones on AM To Bernice CT cc Subject Re Confirmation on Master Dates Do you have access to the Financial Trading Agreement database where you can look these dates up Bernice Rodriguez PM To Tana CT cc Melinda CT Subject Confirmation on Master Dates Tana Can you please confirm for me what the financial master agreement dates are for Utilicorp United Inc GCP shows and Dynegy Canada Inc GCP shows Canada currently has several confirmations that are being held until we can resolve what the dates are Bernice

GCP Completed Book request BDECST Cc Hi All CP BankruptcyCAD has been setup in GCP Call if you have questions I will be out next week see Cheryl Johnson and Bill Hare for setups Have a happy and safe holiday as well Bernice x Original Message From Trevino Susan Sent Wednesday December PM To Hare Bill D Johnson Cheryl Otegbola Remi Rodriguez Bernice Cc Lim Francis S Cheung Cecilia Love Phillip M Wilson Shona Abel Chris Ayala Susie Subject Book request BDECST Importance High Bernice please set up the attached book request and notify when complete FrancisCecilia I will be out of the office Thursday and Friday Dec and Please handle the Erms side once Bernice sends out the notification I have already set up these books in RisktRAC Due to the Outlook problems I was unable to handle this request in a timely fashion Sorry for any delays this may have caused Thanks everyone and have a happy and safe holiday Susan x File BDecSTxls
Out of Office AutoReply PPL EnergyPlus LLCI will be out of the office Friday October th For immediate assistance please call Cheryl Johnson x Bernice Rodriguez Global Counterparty Houston Operations

Cargill Inc EWSharon at Cargill called in regards to deal EW She wants to see if we can delete the Effective Date and Termination Date on the confirmation Since the term is defined in the Determination Period she thought it would be less confusing Let me know what you think Bernice Fax to follow
Noble Gas Mktg EYPlease review the following collar transaction Special notice of the premium payment added Any comments Fax of deal ticket to follow Bernice

Traders added to Estate EPMI Performance booksPST All The traders have been added to CP EPMI East Performance and CP EPMI West Performance Bernice Original Message From Rodriguez Bernice Sent Friday January AM To Chitradurga Sundar Khyrullah Lamya Subject Traders to be added to Estate EPMI Performance books Sundar I need assistance on adding EPMI traders to CP EPMI East Performance and CP EPMI West Performance Please use the contacts from CP EPMI West Bankruptcy and add them to the EPMI Power Category Physical Trading role Bernice Original Message From Rodriguez Bernice Sent Friday January AM To Hare Bill D Cc Luu Duong Smith Will Nommensen Dave Crooks William Kroumov Kroum White Stacey W Postlethwaite John Evans Casey Subject URGENTEPMI Performance books GCP Completed Response All The following have been setup in GCP CP EPMI East Performance CP EPMI West Performance PLEASE NOTE I have confirmed with Casey that ALL traders active or inactive in GCP must be attached to these books I am currently working with GCP IT to attach about traders from the back end and will advise when this step is completed Bernice x Original Message From Hare Bill D Sent Friday January AM To Rodriguez Bernice Cc Luu Duong Smith Will Hare Bill D Nommensen Dave Crooks William Kroumov Kroum White Stacey W Postlethwaite John Subject FW URGENTEPMI Performance books Please inform Casey when complete Bill Original Message From Evans Casey Sent Friday January AM To Luu Duong Smith Will Hare Bill D Nommensen Dave Crooks William Kroumov Kroum Cc White Stacey W Postlethwaite John Subject URGENTEPMI Performance books The request to have all currently performing deals moved to the East Performance and West Performance books has just been expressed as URGENT As soon as the East Performance and West Performance books are set up in Global we will need Enpower refreshed ASAP Bill H is coordinating the setup in global DaveCrooks are coordinating the script to be run to change the primary desk name If anyone has any questions at all PLEASE let me know Thanks to all and sorry for the fire drill Casey

FW Global ContractsFacilities new responsibilitiesOriginal Message From Richardson Stacey Sent Tuesday November AM To Wallumrod Ellen Anderson Diane Miroballi Angelo Riordan Sean Tackett Scott Palmer B Scott Keiser Kam Love Phillip M Baumbach David Hodge Jeffrey T Dickson Stacy E Perlingiere Debra Nemec Gerald Lambert Karen Huthmacher Tammie Dupont Sherry Jones Tana Panus Stephanie Boyd Samantha Bailey Susan Coleman Tandra Hare Bill D Rodriguez Bernice Arnold Thu Vasan Sue Williams Jason R Credit Vanek Darren Campbell Lesli Brackett Debbie R Cc Theriot Kim S Anderson Bridgette Bryan Linda S Campos Sylvia A Elledge Susan Hilliard Marlene Landau Georgi Gonzales Sharon Subject Global ContractsFacilities new responsibilities Attached please find the UPDATED responsibilities for the Global Contracts and Global Facilities teams Due to restructuring within our group we have lost three team members Anthony Campos Cyndie BalfourFlanagan and Ryan Sheeren to the physical gas confirmation group Our team members individual responsibilities have changed as a result Please forward the attached information to your staff and coworkers Please call me at x if you should have any questions Thanks Stacey

EIM Group LinksHi All Below are the EIM group links that were created in GCP Please make sure these group links are added when creating new cps or address roles EIM Financial EIM Physical EIM Brokers EIM Products Exchange Bernice C Rodriguez ENW GCP Houston Operations

Changes to ERMS shortnamesHi All If a change is needed to the ERMS shortname field in GCP please forward your request to Cheryl Johnson Cheryl must coordinate these changes with ERMS IT Bernice Original Message From Khyrullah Lamya Sent Tuesday November PM To Hare Bill D Coleman Tandra Rodriguez Bernice Machado Matilda Schott Samuel Johnson Cheryl HunterLindsay Brian Cc Chitradurga Sundar Subject ERMS Problem Importance High Hi All We are having some problems in ERMS as sometimes a user inserts ERMS code twice by entering an expiry dt for the old one This is creating a problem in credit as they are getting erms code for a single cp Thus I would like to change the validation where only one ERMS code can be entered Please let me know this by tomm Thanks Lamya x

Gloria is going to be late today Cc Original Message From ENRON Sent Tuesday November AM To Rodriguez Bernice Subject Going to be late today I am going to be in a little late today I have an emergency to take care of this morning Thanks Gloria
Time Converter Websitecgibintzctzc Bernice C Rodriguez ENW GCP Houston Operations
